webwork-tex.statement:
\leavevmode\\\relax
Find the linearization of the function \(f(x,y) = \sqrt{214 - 5 x^2 - 5 y^2}\) at the point (5, -4). \leavevmode\\\relax \(L(x,y) =\) \mbox{\parbox[t]{30ex}{\hrulefill}} \leavevmode\\\relax Use the linear approximation to estimate the value of \(f(4.9, -3.9)\) = \mbox{\parbox[t]{20ex}{\hrulefill}} \par
